00040 CMPIObjectPath* _makePath_RouteUsesEndpoint(const CMPIBroker *_broker,
00041                                             const CMPIObjectPath *ops,
00042                                             const CMPIObjectPath *opt,
00043                                             CMPIStatus *rc)
00044 {
00045     _OSBASE_TRACE(4, ("--- _makePath_RouteUsesEndpoint() called"));
00046 
00047     CMPIObjectPath *op = NULL; // Assoc objectPath.
00048     CMPIInstance   *ci = NULL; // Assoc instance.
00049 
00050     // Get assoc instance.
00051     ci = _makeInst_RouteUsesEndpoint(_broker, ops, opt, rc);
00052     if(CMIsNullObject(ci)) {
00053         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00054                              "Could not create instance.");
00055         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makePath_RouteUsesEndpoint() failed: %s",
00056                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00057         goto out;
00058     }
00059 
00060     // Get assoc objectPath.
00061     op = CMGetObjectPath(ci, rc);
00062     if(CMIsNullObject(op)) {
00063         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00064                              "Could not get objectPath.");
00065         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makePath_RouteUsesEndpoint() failed: %s",
00066                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00067         goto out;
00068     }
00069     CMSetNameSpace(op, CMGetCharPtr(CMGetNameSpace(ops, rc)));
00070 
00071  out:
00072     _OSBASE_TRACE(4, ("--- _makePath_RouteUsesEndpoint() exited"));
00073     return op;
00074 }

00077 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 CMPIInstance* _makeInst_RouteUsesEndpoint(const CMPIBroker *_broker,
00079                                           const CMPIObjectPath *ops,
00080                                           const CMPIObjectPath *opt,
00081                                           CMPIStatus *rc)
00082 {
00083     _OSBASE_TRACE(4, ("--- _makeInst_RouteUsesEndpoint() called"));
00084 
00085     CMPIObjectPath *op = NULL; // Assoc objectPath.
00086     CMPIInstance   *ci = NULL; // Assoc instance.
00087 
00088     // Create assoc objectPath.
00089     op = CMNewObjectPath(_broker, CMGetCharPtr(CMGetNameSpace(ops, rc)),
00090                          _ClassName, rc);
00091     if(CMIsNullObject(op)) {
00092         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00093                              "Could not get objectPath.");
00094         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makeInst_RouteUsesEndpoint() failed: %s",
00095                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00096         goto out;
00097     }
00098 
00099     // Create assoc instance.
00100     ci = CMNewInstance(_broker, op, rc);
00101     if(CMIsNullObject(ci)) {
00102         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00103                              "Could not create instance.");
00104         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makeInst_RouteUsesEndpoint() failed: %s",
00105                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00106         goto out;
00107     }
00108 
00109     CMSetProperty(ci, _RefLeft, (CMPIValue*)&(ops), CMPI_ref);
00110     CMSetProperty(ci, _RefRight, (CMPIValue*)&(opt), CMPI_ref);
00111 
00112  out:
00113     _OSBASE_TRACE(4, ("--- _makeInst_RouteUsesEndpoint() exited"));
00114     return ci;
00115 }

00119 CMPIStatus* _assoc_get_NextHopRoute_insts(const CMPIBroker *_broker,
00120                                           const CMPIContext *ctx,
00121                                           const CMPIResult *rslt,
00122                                           const CMPIObjectPath *ref,
00123                                           const CMPIInstance *sourceInst,
00124                                           const char *targetClass,
00125                                           const int assocType,
00126                                           CMPIStatus *rc)
00127 {
00128     _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_NextHopRoute_insts() called"));
00129 
00130     CMPIEnumeration *cet          = NULL; // Target class enumeration.
00131     CMPIObjectPath  *opt          = NULL; // Target objectPath.
00132     CMPIObjectPath  *opit         = NULL; // Target instance objectPath.
00133     CMPIData         instData;            // Target instance data.
00134     CMPIData         data;                // CIM datum to extract property
00135                                           // values.
00136     CMPIInstance    *rcit         = NULL; // Result reference instance.
00137     CMPIObjectPath  *ropt         = NULL; // Result reference objectPath.
00138     int              ifindex;             // Interface index.
00139     char             resultClass[256];    // @todo remove.
00140 
00141     // @todo remove this, we should found a better way to handle this.
00142     if(strcasecmp(targetClass, _ClassName) == 0) {
00143         snprintf(resultClass, 256, "%s", _RefRightClasses[0]);
00144     } else {
00145         snprintf(resultClass, 256, "%s", targetClass);
00146     }
00147 
00148     // Get ElementName.
00149     data = CMGetProperty(sourceInst, "ElementName", rc);
00150     if((rc->rc != CMPI_RC_OK) || (CMIsNullValue(data)) ||
00151        (data.type != CMPI_string)) {
00152         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_NO_SUCH_PROPERTY,
00153                              "Cannot determine ElementName");
00154         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_NextHopRoute_insts() failed: %s",
00155                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00156         goto out;
00157     }
00158 
00159     // Get interface index.
00160     sscanf(CMGetCharPtr(data.value.string), "%*[^_]_%d", &ifindex);
00161 
00162     // Create ObjectPath of result class.
00163     opt = CMNewObjectPath(_broker, CMGetCharPtr(CMGetNameSpace(ref, rc)),
00164                           resultClass, rc);
00165     if(CMIsNullObject(opt)) {
00166         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00167                              "Create CMPIObjectPath failed.");
00168         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_NextHopRoute_insts() failed: %s",
00169                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00170         goto out;
00171     }
00172 
00173     // Enumerate result instances.
00174     cet = CBEnumInstances(_broker, ctx, opt, NULL, rc);
00175     if(CMIsNullObject(cet)) {
00176         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00177                              "Could not enumerate result instances.");
00178         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_NextHopRoute_insts() failed: %s",
00179                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00180         goto out;
00181     }
00182 
00183     // Retrieve instances.
00184     while(CMHasNext(cet, rc)) {
00185         instData = CMGetNext(cet, rc);
00186         if(CMIsNullObject(instData.value.inst)) {
00187             CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00188                                  "Could not retrieve instance from "    \
00189                                  "enumeration.");
00190             _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_NextHopRoute_insts() failed: %s",
00191                               CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00192             goto out;
00193         }
00194 
00195         // Get RouteOutputIf.
00196         data = CMGetProperty(instData.value.inst, "RouteOutputIf", rc);
00197         if((rc->rc != CMPI_RC_OK) || (CMIsNullValue(data)) ||
00198            (data.type != CMPI_uint16)) {
00199             CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_NO_SUCH_PROPERTY,
00200                                  "Cannot determine RouteOutputIf");
00201             _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_NextHopRoute_insts() failed: %s",
00202                               CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00203             goto out;
00204         }
00205 
00206         if((int)(data.value.uint16) == ifindex) {
00207             // Get objectPath.
00208             opit = CMGetObjectPath(instData.value.inst, rc);
00209             if(CMIsNullObject(opit)) {
00210                 CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00211                                      "Could not get objectPath.");
00212                 _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_NextHopRoute_insts() " \
00213                                   "failed: %s", CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00214                 goto out;
00215             }
00216             CMSetNameSpace(opit, CMGetCharPtr(CMGetNameSpace(ref, rc)));
00217 
00218             if(assocType == ATYPE_ASSOC) { // Associators.
00219                 CMReturnInstance(rslt, instData.value.inst);
00220             } else if(assocType == ATYPE_ASSOCN) { // AssociatorNames.
00221                 CMReturnObjectPath(rslt, opit);
00222             } else if(assocType == ATYPE_REFER) { // References.
00223                 rcit = _makeInst_RouteUsesEndpoint(_broker, ref, opit, rc);
00224                 CMReturnInstance(rslt, rcit);
00225             } else if(assocType == ATYPE_REFERN) { // ReferenceNames.
00226                 ropt = _makePath_RouteUsesEndpoint(_broker, ref, opit, rc);
00227                 CMReturnObjectPath(rslt, ropt);
00228             } else {
00229                 CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_NOT_SUPPORTED,
00230                                      "Wrong association type or not "   \
00231                                      "supported.");
00232                 _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- __assoc_get_NextHopRoute_insts() failed: %s",
00233                                   CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00234                 goto out;
00235             }
00236         }
00237     }
00238 
00239  out:
00240     _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_NextHopRoute_insts() exited"));
00241     return rc;
00242 }

00246 CMPIStatus* _assoc_get_ProtocolEndpoint_insts(const CMPIBroker *_broker,
00247                                               const CMPIContext *ctx,
00248                                               const CMPIResult *rslt,
00249                                               const CMPIObjectPath *ref,
00250                                               const CMPIInstance *sourceInst,
00251                                               const char *targetClass,
00252                                               const int assocType,
00253                                               CMPIStatus *rc)
00254 {
00255     _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_ProtocolEndpoint_insts() called"));
00256 
00257     CMPIEnumeration *cet          = NULL; // Target class enumeration.
00258     CMPIObjectPath  *opt          = NULL; // Target objectPath.
00259     CMPIObjectPath  *opit         = NULL; // Target instance objectPath.
00260     CMPIData         instData;            // Target instance data.
00261     CMPIData         data;                // CIM datum to extract property
00262                                           // values.
00263     CMPIInstance    *rcit         = NULL; // Result reference instance.
00264     CMPIObjectPath  *ropt         = NULL; // Result reference objectPath.
00265     int              ifindex;             // Interface index.
00266     int              tmpIndex;            // Temp store ifindex of an instance.
00267     char             resultClass[256];    // @todo remove.
00268 
00269     // @todo remove this, we should found a better way to handle this.
00270     if(strcasecmp(targetClass, _ClassName) == 0) {
00271         snprintf(resultClass, 256, "%s", _RefLeftClasses[0]);
00272     } else {
00273         snprintf(resultClass, 256, "%s", targetClass);
00274     }
00275 
00276     // Get RouteOutputIf.
00277     data = CMGetProperty(sourceInst, "RouteOutputIf", rc);
00278     if((rc->rc != CMPI_RC_OK) || (CMIsNullValue(data)) ||
00279        (data.type != CMPI_uint16)) {
00280         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_NO_SUCH_PROPERTY,
00281                              "Cannot determine RouteOutputIf");
00282         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_ProtocolEndpoint_insts() failed: %s",
00283                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00284         goto out;
00285     }
00286 
00287     // Get interface index.
00288     ifindex = (int)(data.value.uint16);
00289 
00290     // Create ObjectPath of result class.
00291     opt = CMNewObjectPath(_broker, CMGetCharPtr(CMGetNameSpace(ref,rc)),
00292                           resultClass, rc);
00293     if(CMIsNullObject(opt)) {
00294         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00295                              "Create CMPIObjectPath failed.");
00296         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_ProtocolEndpoint_insts() failed: %s",
00297                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00298         goto out;
00299     }
00300 
00301     // Enumerate result instances.
00302     cet = CBEnumInstances(_broker, ctx, opt, NULL, rc);
00303     if(CMIsNullObject(cet)) {
00304         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00305                              "Could not enumerate result instances.");
00306         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_ProtocolEndpoint_insts() failed: %s",
00307                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00308         goto out;
00309     }
00310 
00311     // Retrieve instances.
00312     while(CMHasNext(cet, rc)) {
00313         instData = CMGetNext(cet, rc);
00314         if(CMIsNullObject(instData.value.inst)) {
00315             CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00316                                  "Could not retrieve instance from "    \
00317                                  "enumeration.");
00318             _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_ProtocolEndpoint_insts() " \
00319                               "failed: %s", CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00320             goto out;
00321         }
00322 
00323         // Get ElementName.
00324         data = CMGetProperty(instData.value.inst, "ElementName", rc);
00325         if((rc->rc != CMPI_RC_OK) || (CMIsNullValue(data)) ||
00326            (data.type != CMPI_string)) {
00327             CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_NO_SUCH_PROPERTY,
00328                                  "Cannot determine ElementName");
00329             _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_ProtocolEndpoint_insts() " \
00330                               "failed: %s", CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00331             goto out;
00332         }
00333 
00334         // Get interface index.
00335         sscanf(CMGetCharPtr(data.value.string), "%*[^_]_%d", &tmpIndex);
00336 
00337         if(tmpIndex == ifindex) {
00338             // Get objectPath.
00339             opit = CMGetObjectPath(instData.value.inst, rc);
00340             if(CMIsNullObject(opit)) {
00341                 CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00342                                      "Could not get objectPath.");
00343                 _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_ProtocolEndpoint_insts() " \
00344                                   "failed: %s", CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00345                 goto out;
00346             }
00347             CMSetNameSpace(opit, CMGetCharPtr(CMGetNameSpace(ref, rc)));
00348 
00349             if(assocType == ATYPE_ASSOC) { // Associators.
00350                 CMReturnInstance(rslt, instData.value.inst);
00351             } else if(assocType ==  ATYPE_ASSOCN) { // AssociatorNames.
00352                 CMReturnObjectPath(rslt, opit);
00353             } else if(assocType == ATYPE_REFER) { // References.
00354                 rcit = _makeInst_RouteUsesEndpoint(_broker, ref, opit, rc);
00355                 CMReturnInstance(rslt, rcit);
00356             } else if(assocType == ATYPE_REFERN) { // ReferenceNames.
00357                 ropt = _makePath_RouteUsesEndpoint(_broker, ref, opit, rc);
00358                 CMReturnObjectPath(rslt, ropt);
00359             } else {
00360                 CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_NOT_SUPPORTED,
00361                                      "Wrong association type or not "   \
00362                                      "supported.");
00363                 _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_ProtocolEndpoint_insts() "\
00364                                   "failed: %s", CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00365                 goto out;
00366             }
00367         }
00368     }
00369 
00370  out:
00371     _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_get_ProtocolEndpoint_insts() exited"));
00372     return rc;
00373 }

00375 
00376 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00377 CMPIStatus _assoc_RouteUsesEndpoint(const CMPIBroker *_broker,
00378                                     const CMPIContext *ctx,
00379                                     const CMPIResult *rslt,
00380                                     const CMPIObjectPath *ref,
00381                                     const char *targetClass,
00382                                     const int assocType,
00383                                     CMPIStatus *rc)
00384 {
00385     _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_RouteUsesEndpoint() called"));
00386 
00387     CMPIInstance   *cis          = NULL; // Source class instance.
00388     CMPIString     *srcClassName = NULL; // Source class name.
00389     int             i, instFound = 0;
00390 
00391     // Check if source instance does exist.
00392     cis = CBGetInstance(_broker, ctx, ref, NULL, rc);
00393     if(CMIsNullObject(cis)) {
00394         if(rc->rc == CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED) {
00395             CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00396                                  "GetInstance of source object failed.");
00397         }
00398         if(rc->rc == CMPI_RC_ERR_NOT_FOUND) {
00399             CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_NOT_FOUND,
00400                                  "Source object not found.");
00401         }
00402         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_RouteUsesEndpoint() failed: %s",
00403                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00404         goto out;
00405     }
00406 
00407     // Get source class name.
00408     srcClassName = CMGetClassName(ref, rc);
00409     if(CMGetCharPtr(srcClassName) == NULL) {
00410         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00411                              "Could not retrieve source class name.");
00412         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_RouteUsesEndpoint() failed: %s",
00413                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00414         goto out;
00415     }
00416 
00417     // Check if source class is one of the supported right classes.
00418     for(i=0 ; i<ARRAY_SIZE(_RefRightClasses) ; i++) {
00419         if(strcasecmp(CMGetCharPtr(srcClassName),
00420                       _RefRightClasses[i]) == 0) {
00421             // Returned instances are subclasses of type CIM_ProtocolEndpoint.
00422             rc = _assoc_get_ProtocolEndpoint_insts(_broker, ctx, rslt, ref, cis,
00423                                                    targetClass, assocType, rc);
00424             instFound = 1;
00425         }
00426     }
00427 
00428     // Check if source class is one of the supported left classes.
00429     if(!instFound) {
00430         for(i=0 ; i<ARRAY_SIZE(_RefLeftClasses) ; i++) {
00431             if(strcasecmp(CMGetCharPtr(srcClassName),
00432                           _RefLeftClasses[i]) == 0) {
00433                 // Returned instances are subclasses of type CIM_NextHopRoute.
00434                 rc = _assoc_get_NextHopRoute_insts(_broker, ctx, rslt, ref, cis,
00435                                                    targetClass, assocType, rc);
00436                 instFound = 1;
00437             }
00438         }
00439     }
00440 
00441     // Target class not supported.
00442     if(!instFound) {
00443         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_NOT_SUPPORTED,
00444                              "Association not supported "
00445                              "(check source and target classes).");
00446         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_RouteUsesEndpoint() failed: %s",
00447                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00448         goto out;
00449     }
00450 
00451  out:
00452     _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _assoc_RouteUsesEndpoint() exited"));
00453     return (*rc);
00454 }
